message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statements provided.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a clear line item:
```
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-01-29 |
```

This is explicitly stated as the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents.

Alternatively, I can also verify this from the balance sheet, where the initial amounts for cash and cash equivalents would be:
- Cash on Hand: 3000000.00 (2023-12-31)
- Bank Deposits: 5000000.00 (2023-12-31)
Total: 8000000.00

Both approaches confirm that the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
